name: Dark Hunter
description:
Three bosses. One life

You are a member of an anti-biological experiments organization recently commissioned to eliminate three mutants. How quickly can you destroy them, and can you at all? 

The main essence of the game is to survive under a hail of bullets and the onslaught of the enemy, otherwise everything will have to start over

The controls are standard, WASD and the left mouse button to attack

During the battle, you can use shelters and other features of the location, both interfering and helping you in the battle

We hope you can beat all three bosses. For fun, send your highscores in the comments 

P.S. It is recommended to play the Desktop version of the game, the Web version works, but the Development build is loaded. Full screen on web version RECOMMENDED
